title: On Treacherous Ground
description: Homecoming after a long time is often painful. For Vierra, misery comes from many directions, for her home has changed. The winds of change bring forth a battle which Vierra has to fight in two fronts: first one for her tribe, the second for her own fate within. Part seven of Fargoer, a series of short stories set in the mythic past.
author: Petteri Hannila
